messages.title: Saving Our Green Belt
messages.content: It is really great that so many local people are backing my campaign to stop the Labour Government allowing thousands of new homes to be built on the green belt here in Broxtowe.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stop the Labour Government from allowing new homes to be built on the green belt in Broxtowe.

issues.economy: my campaign to bring more jobs

housing.content: Stop the Labour Government from allowing new homes to be built on the green belt in Broxtowe.

leaflet.personalStatement: As your local MP, I will always put local people first - just like I have on the green belt. Broxtowe is a great place to live (something my Tory opponent hasn't realised - she lives in the city) and I would be proud to represent our area in Parliament - fighting to deliver a better deal for you.

politicalExperience.role: Chair of Broxtowe's Development Control Committee
politicalExperience.achievements: ensured that public meetings have been held throughout Broxtowe telling people what is being considered and giving them the opportunity to have their say

contactInformation.address: 45 Enfield Street Beeston Nottingham NG9 1RL Broxtowe

leaflet.additionalNotes: PS. Don't forget, a Lib-Dem vote here is not a wasted vote, but a vote for the future of Broxtowe.
